ingredients: +   1/2 cup vegetable oil, 4 medium red onions, thinly sliced, 3 pounds bone-in chicken pieces, 2 cups hot water or as needed, 2   +   1/2 cups pomegranate juice, 4 cups chopped walnuts, 2 tablespoons freshly ground cardamom, 2 tablespoons ground cinnamon, 1 medium butternut squash, seeded and cubed,   +   1/4 teaspoon saffron powder, 1 teaspoon salt, or to taste
